title: Stool, "Softseating", 2007
dimensions:
H x diam. (open): 45.7 x 40.6 cm (18 x 16 in.)
H x W x D (Closed): 45 x 20 x 8.5 cm (17 11/16 x 7 7/8 x 3 3/8 in.)
creditline: The Linda and Irwin R. Berman Stool Collection
description: Collapsible stool composed of white polyethylene sheets joined to form cylindrical honeycombed structure (polyethylene sandwiched between two white cardboard sheets each with three embedded magnets that link to form cylinder; cardboard sheets can be separated so structure collapses into a rectangular block for storage).

tombstone.epitaph:
Stool, "Softseating", 2007.
2007. Polyethylene (non-woven), cardboard, magnets. The Linda and Irwin R. Berman Stool Collection. 2007-34-1.
